description:
NTS Map: 031H11
Easy trail near Montreal. Not very high in elevation, but good for an outdoor afternoon.
directions:
Follow directions to Saint-Bruno, and then follow Parc du mont St-Bruno indications.
Highway 30 (exit 121)
Highway 20 (exit 102)
550 Rang des Vingt-cinq
Saint-Bruno (QC) J3V 4P6
Canada
title: Mont St-Bruno
